transcript_chunks.text: Obsidian is always delivering great games and they have a third game launching this year. You'll get to go deeper on it and our direct, but until then, let's take a look. [Music] No, three games in one [Music] ear. Awesome. Cool. Yeah. [Music] Wow. Holy That's crazy. What? July 29th. What are they doing?
